subject: America's Cup
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: Nearly two and a half years after Alinghi successfully defended the trophy in July 2007 in Valencia, Spain, there is still no confirmed site for the next America’s Cup.
snippet: Nearly two and a half years after Alinghi successfully defended the trophy in July 2007 in Valencia, Spain, there is still no confirmed site for the next America’s Cup.
